pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Few Functions to Help in your Coding Etiquette // Adds a few functions to help in your coding etiquette. 'tinycodet' primarily focuses on 4 aspects. 1) Safer decimal (in)equality testing, safer atomic conversions, and other functions for safer coding. 2) A new package import system, that attempts to combine the benefits of using a package without attaching, with the benefits of attaching a package. 3) Extending the string manipulation capabilities of the 'stringi' R package. 4) Reducing repetitive code. 'tinycodet' has only one dependency, namely 'stringi'.
